div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1666 Mit Ya-ish, 10 km. S of Mit Ghamr- Zifta, near anc. Leontopolis, 1954 Burial: c. 315 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 200 AR Alexander III: lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Alexandreia, as Svoronos pl. 1, 7) Disposition: unknown Information from R. Hazzard, Toronto
